verses.name: Genesis 37:10
verses.text: And he told it to his father, and to his brethren: and his father rebuked him, and said unto him, What is this dream that thou hast dreamed? Shall I and thy mother and thy brethren indeed come to bow down ourselves to thee to the earth?

verses.name: Genesis 37:11
verses.text: And his brethren envied him; but his father observed the saying.

verses.name: Genesis 37:12
verses.text: And his brethren went to feed their father’s flock in Shechem.

verses.name: Genesis 37:13
verses.text: And Israel said unto Joseph, Do not thy brethren feed the flock in Shechem? come, and I will send thee unto them. And he said to him, Here am I.
